ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the Possessor of the Throne, the All-Glorious,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The Lord of the glorious Throne,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: – the Lord of the Glorious Throne,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: the Owner of the Throne, the Glorious One,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Owner of the Throne, Al-Majid (the Glorious).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Lord of the Arsh, the Glorious,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Lord of the Throne, the All-glorious,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lord of the Throne of Glory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The Lord of the Glorious Throne,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Lord of the Throne, the Glorious,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Lord of the Throne, the All-glorious,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Lord of the Throne of Glory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Owner of the throne, the Glorious
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Owner of the Throne, the Exalted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [85:15] Lord of the Throne, its Creator and Possessor, the Glorious (read nominative al-majīdu), the One deserving of the perfect attributes of sublimity,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lord of the Throne of Glory) the good and fine Throne; and it is also said this means: Lord of the glorious Throne,
